windows.changelog:
#What new ?
- New feature "UPGRADE THIS APP"
Open gTune --> UPGRADE --> UPGRADE THIS APP
- New feature "UPGRADE FIRMWARE"
Open gTune --> UPGRADE --> UPGRADE FIRMWARE --> AUTO UPGRADE
- Feature Auto Tune
Open gTune -->SETTINGS --> STIFFNESS
Note: This is still a beta development feature, so please be carefull 
- Detect gimbal T3_2AXIS when connect with gTuneDesktop
